mapper.update: update t_layuiuser set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign = #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, experience = #{experience,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logins = #{logins,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, wealth = #{wealth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classify = #{classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, sex, city, sign, experience, logins, score, wealth, classify from t_layuiuser
